entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3 except temperature steady near minus 8 over the Highlands. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3 except temperature steady near minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
